select zto.mandt, zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, zto.MIPOS, zto.KDAUF, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.msehl2 msehl1, orderbom.zdtyl, taskbom.menge, sum(nvl(sup.car_num,0)) LGMNG, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(carplan.cuid) carplancuid, 'A' as LLTYP from zg_t_order zto, zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_carbom_suppliers sup, zg_t_order_planbom planbom,
zg_t_order_task task, zg_t_order_taskbom taskbom
where zto.cuid = task.order_id and task.cuid=carbom.order_task_id and taskbom.cuid = carbom.taskbom_id and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and carbom.cuid = sup.car_bom_id and planbom.cuid=carbom.order_planbom_id and planbom.taskbom_id=taskbom.cuid and taskbom.order_bom_id=orderbom.cuid and sup.car_num>0 and carplan.syn = '0' and carplan.type='2' and carplan.car_state='8' and carplan.order_plan_type <>'3'
group by zto.mandt, zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.msehl2 , orderbom.zdtyl, taskbom.menge, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, zto.MIPOS, zto.KDAUF

zg_t_order_task task, zg_t_order_taskbom taskbom where planbom.taskbom_id=taskbom.cuid and taskbom.order_bom_id=orderbom.cuid and planbom.cuid=carbom.order_planbom_id and zto.cuid = task.order_id and task.cuid=carbom.order_task_id and orderbom.cuid = taskbom.order_bom_id and carbom.taskbom_id=taskbom.cuid and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and carbom.cuid = sup.car_bom_id and sup.car_num>0 and carplan.syn = '0' and carplan.type='2' and carplan.car_state='8' and carplan.order_plan_type <>'3' and planbom.order_plan_id='$orderPlanId$' group by zto.mandt, zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.msehl2 , orderbom.zdtyl, taskbom.menge, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, zto.MIPOS, zto.KDAUF

select zto.mandt, zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, zto.MIPOS, zto.KDAUF, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.msehl2 msehl1, orderbom.zdtyl, taskbom.menge, sum(nvl(sup.car_num,0)) LGMNG, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(carplan.cuid) carplancuid, 'A' as LLTYP from zg_t_order zto, zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_carbom_suppliers sup, zg_t_order_planbom planbom,
zg_t_order_task task, zg_t_order_taskbom taskbom where planbom.taskbom_id=taskbom.cuid and taskbom.order_bom_id=orderbom.cuid and planbom.cuid=carbom.order_planbom_id and zto.cuid=task.order_id and task.cuid = carbom.order_task_id and orderbom.cuid = taskbom.order_bom_id and carbom.taskbom_id=taskbom.cuid and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and carbom.cuid = sup.car_bom_id and sup.car_num>0 and carplan.syn = '0' and carplan.type='2' and carplan.car_state='8' and carplan.cuid='$carPlanId$' group by zto.mandt, zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.msehl2 , orderbom.zdtyl, taskbom.menge, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, zto.MIPOS, zto.KDAUF

select null as mandt, null as aufnr, null as matnr, null as maktx1, null as arbpl, null as MIPOS, null as KDAUF, bom.idnrk, bom.maktx maktx2, bom.msehl msehl1, null as zdtyl, planbom.car_num menge, sum(nvl(sup.car_num,carbom.real_num)) LGMNG, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name, null as sortf, bom.lgort, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(carplan.cuid) carplancuid, 'P' as LLTYP
from zg_t_bom bom, zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_carbom_suppliers sup, zg_t_order_planbom planbom where carbom.order_planbom_id=planbom.cuid and planbom.bom_id=bom.cuid and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and carbom.cuid = sup.car_bom_id and sup.car_num>0 and carplan.syn = '0' and carplan.type='2' and carplan.car_state='8' and carplan.order_plan_type='3'
carplan.cuid='$orderPlanId$'
